CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 20, 1961, pg. 2 reads: "Ousted - Sarah Kirk, longtime alderman in 13th Ward, who was defeated for ward chairman, by Linn Washington, in 1960, lost again in her bid for renomination."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Sarah Kirk seated at desk holding telephone receiver, in office interior with four framed documents and portrait of Roosevelt
